ai_banner_text: This is an AI Generated Content

consensus.label: High (Negative)
consensus.summary: Top comments overwhelmingly condemn the video as disrespectful/inauthentic to the artist’s voice and craft.
consensus.full_summary: Top comments overwhelmingly condemn the video as disrespectful/inauthentic to Carlin’s voice and craft. Community refs are mostly news/legal links calling out the release and lawsuit, not technical citations — refs present but external-media–driven. Example: The Guardian + Newsweek + The Hollywood Reporter.

risks: exploitation of a deceased artist’s likeness, misleading provenance (is it “AI” or human-written + voice clone?), and mass reuploads for engagement.
